reviewText: I love the style just the sizes run very small.

I just received my pants. I love them. I was worried with the other reviews being so negative. I am 5'8" 130 pounds. I ordered a size large. The fit was perfect. They went to the floor, so not to short. Workmanship was fantastic. Material is heavy and a rich color. I ordered black. Would buy again in a heartbeat. Took a week and a half to get here. Ordered when they had free shipping. Very pleased!!!!

These pants are absolutely wonderful, minus a couple of things.  Here are the issues:

1) the sizing chart is somewhat inaccurate.  I wear a Juniors size 9 typically, or a women size 8.  I ordered a size medium.  While I was able to button them, it was tough.  It was just too small in the waist, and the pant length was a tad to short.  It caused the "its one size too small muffin top" making it rather uncomfortable to bend or sit.

2) they are labeled as Dry Clean only on the tag, and when i bought them the amazon description said hand wash.

Also just a general note.  These ship from China directly.  They showed up about a week and a half after I ordered them which was awesome, but that is why the shipping is so much,

Seller note:  the seller is awesome.  I contacted them via amazon about the sizing issue and they got back to me right away requesting measurements to make sure they get the right size if I was interested in getting some larger ones.

I would definitely get these again, and I would definitely order from this seller again.  Just be careful of the sizing!
summary: They are awesome!  but run a size small and are labeled dry clean only.

WOW!!!  I ordered several clutches from multiple vendors online with Amazon. This was by far the best!  Its excellent quality cannot be determined by photographs.  This is a very substantial, absolutely gorgeous clutch, made of the highest quality.  It is not too heavy or large to take with you, but it definitely feels sturdy and exceedingly more expensive than it is.  This is one of the most elegant clutches I have ever seen.  Obviously, it recently arrived, so I am uncertain about how the glitter will hold up in time, but I believe it will last for a very long time.  I would rate it 15 or 20 stars if possible.  I love it so much that I plan to buy one in nearly every color offered and there is no way that you will be disappointed by your purchase.  Fawziya leads the way when it comes to clutch quality, with ILILAC as a very close second.  Let's bring a strong, femininely elegance back to the women of society.  We can start right here!  Happy shopping!
summary: Let Us Bring Back Femininely Elegance

reviewText: This arrived very carefully wrapped in plastic to protect it from scratches, and in a very nice box that will serve as excellent storage for it when not using it. This bag really is a lovely accessory - it looks more like jewelry than a functional piece, and I chose the red one and carried it when I dressed up to attend a wedding. I received many compliments on it! It took me awhile to figure out how to open it, and the little loops on hinges that hold the optional chain straps - there are two - look very flimsy - so I didn't bother with them and carried it as a clutch. As I had planned to do. It is just large enough for your phone, your key fob, and a tube of lipstick, and a kleenex or a hankie. Perfect. And a really good value for the money. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Unfortunately the bag is not as big as I thought. It is an absolutely beautiful bag and luckily I made it work. I had to take the case off my phone and since the bag is 2+ inches wide, I could fit my phone, lipstick and one compact case. A small travel lotion may have fit too. So many people have larger phones these days and it's a shame to have a small evening bag that doesn't fit much. Designed for small heads. Otherwise, they are very stylish looking and are very good knockoffs for a fraction of the cost of real Clubmaster sunglasses by Ray-Ban.

I've been getting cheap sunglasses off amazon for a while now and mostly focused on the Wayfarer and Clubmaster styles. I've had a Clubmaster type before but this one absolutely blows it away. First, the construction has a lightweight, yet solid feel. It feels durable. Second, it feels comfortable. I have an average size face and it fits just right. The other one was a bit small and wouldn't sit right on my head when I go inside, I tilt it up. This one fits just right.  Third, the lenses are very nice. They have a good clarity and the tint is just right for what I was looking for. Great for driving or ha gong around outside. I like the vintage styling, it will never go out of style.
So it is definitely a 10 buck pair of glasses so I can't be that dissatisfied... I'm used to raybans so it's a bit of a step down but it is exactly what is described and shown

To address the complaints about being too plasticky: yes, the shades are made out of standard plastic, but it is not an extremely cheap, flimsy plastic. I would equate the quality to a $40/50 pair.

For wearers with larger heads, however, beware. I have a small head, and the glasses are a snug fit. If you have an average-sized head, you should be ok, but if you have a large head, these are probably not the shades for you.

When it finally arrived there were numerous large holes. When I contacted the company they immediately shipped out a new one. It took a while to get here because of shipping from China. The new product did not have any holes, but again, it is a bright white lace dress. Does not look vintage at all. The company was easy to work with though.
summary: It doesn't look like the picture

reviewText: It was more white than I thought, I wanted something more cream..

For this price and judging by this picture, you know it'd be something pretty decent but not great or anything. However, you wouldn't expect it to be an absolute disappointment. The fabric was too bright white, it looks cheap, and it's way way thin. Originally took a month to arrive but it never did.  I had to contact them, even though they were responsive, and ask to resend it. They did and it took another month of waiting. Looks like beach cover up in picture. Looks like lingerie in reality.
summary: Things are not always as they appear

reviewText:
This thing is a trip!!  If one were to judge by the photo, one would come to believe that this, 'whatevever-it-is', actually had some substance, anything that looked like it might hold together for more than an hour!!  I couldn't believe it!  There are more strands hanging from it than a brothel's entrance!  I just received it, and was just looking to see what I paid for it.  I had assumed I had paid less, which it would barely be worth, for half the price, and was surprised to see it's around $10 bucks??  I have to stop drinking and shopping, or I'll wind up getting a 'SWI'!!

Just another 'heads-up', to try to help other's who might have a lapse in judgement and purchase this!!  One thing's for sure, it brought me a nice laugh!!  If you care, and want to wear, pick something made by someone else!

I feel a bit betrayed by the reviews I usually depend upon for inside info on this type of item!  I'll have to learn which person's reviews are closer to my standards, and limit myself to trusting only those!  I hate to admit, this isn't the only or first time I was led astray by reviews, Live and Learn!
summary: "IF YOU CARE, AND WANT TO WEAR, SKIP THIS NUMBER, FRANKLY, I'M SURPRISED!!

I have had these socks for over a year now. They have held up very well. They stay up - no falling down, haven't stretched out, haven't run or gotten holes. I have noticed some piling of the material - small bits of material balling up like some sweaters do but it very minimal. I bought these for work to wear with dress shoes and suits but I have worn them outside of work as well. I would estimate that each pair I have has been worn about once a week. So say thats 50 wears. $9.99 for three pairs- that is $3.33 a pair - at 50 wears Im at 6 cents per wear and still going. Im 64 and 250 -muscular build with large calf muscles. These stay up. Ordering more today. Edit - looks like the price has gone up a bit in 13 months pricing these closer to mainstream dept store type brands. Ill stick with these rather than risk being disappointed.

reviewText: Finally found socks that fit and stay up.

i have changed my review twice now...here's why...

as a stay-up sock, these cannot be beat! they REALLY stay up! and are comfortable as well as relatively thin so you don't have to buy oversize boots because of typically thick boot socks.

however, the first pair i had wore really fast in the heal so that after about 6 wears, the fabric in the heal was thin and little hard balls of fabric piled up and hurt to walk in. so, i wrote this in this review and gave them 1 star.

but the second pair in a 3-pak has done a lot better, and i'm now at 20 wears with just a little thinning, no pain, and definitely more wear left in them. NOTE: i do wear these with cowboy boots, but still, they should be holding up, and at this point are.

so i have to say these are pretty darn good to the point i have ordered another 3 pair pak.

these would be great with a reinforced heel...but i doubt that is something that will ever be done.
summary: GREAT STAY UP/COMFORTABLE & RELATIVELY THIN FOR A BOOT SOCK

The Product: I like it! I like the design it has and this seller has a lot of neat pocket squares to choose from. I ordered this one as my first purchase to see if I would like it before I ordered more, so yes, I will order others from them. That being said there are a couple things to keep in mind. The pictures that they use are more vibrant than the actual product, in this one the orange and dark blue are much more vibrant in the pictures than the product I received, never the less.. I still like it. When I took a picture of it with my iphone, guess what.. The colors really popped out like the sellers picture. I think the seller does the best job he can representing the product with the amount of pictures and close ups as possible. Also, as some others have stated the material is thicker compared to the usual thin silk pocket square you may be accustomed to. A thinner pocket square with a design in it may have the design in it from silk screen or some other form of design printing, this is more of a tapestry. The gold outline you see everywhere is gold thread. The variation between the dark blue, the light blue and the orange are very nice. Being that it is thicker it's not the best if you prefer the "stuff it" style of a pocket square, but if you do a traditional fold style it will work great because the stiffness of the fabric with hold shape better, at the same time it's not so thick that it's unmanageable. I like it and I will be ordering others. I prefer the thinner silk style of pocket squares but these designs are so nice that I don't mind.
  The Shipping: I ordered this on August 10th and it arrived on August 17th. When I ordered, amazon said it would arrive sometime in the middle of September because it was coming from China so it was a nice surprise when it arrived just 6 days after I purchased. The seller included literature about his commitment and also included a discount coupon for another purchase.
summary: I like it! I like the design it has and ...

Once again, history is repeating itself and overalls have become very fashionable again. These acid washed, distressed denim overall shorts are awesome and I am happy with them. I love the stylish unhemmed shorts, and the distressed look adds to their appeal. The acid wash color is great, because it blends well with almost any color t-shirt or tank top. I'm quite pleased with the quality and look of these overall shorts. The only reason I am rating them with 4 stars instead of 5 is because they do run a bit on the smaller side, and overalls are meant to be a little baggy, not tight at all. If I would have ordered a size up from what I normally wear, they would fit me more comfortably and I would be able to put them in the dryer. If I were to gain even 5 pounds or put them in the dryer, I don't think I would be able to wear them. I'm pleased with my purchase and know I will be wearing these adorable overalls often this summer, but if I had ordered a size up, I would like them even more.

*I purchased this item at a reduced priced in exchange for my honest and true opinion.

reviewText: Running small and quality is cheap

I know I'm late to the show, but this was my first pair of REAL leggings. I have lots of yoga pants and the cropped legging type but no real leggings. So I read reviews for literally like 2 months off and on. I wanted fleece lined. I do like these but they have a sheen to them, a little shiny or like slick when you feel them, kinda like if you are wearing pantyhose. Btw that's also how you put them on. reviewText: Get this for my girlfriend and she is happy with it.

I bought this as a gift for my little sister, and she loves it. Some people have complained that the glow-in-the-dark material is simply a smattering of paint, but I see no problem with that. It's solid and it doesn't come off. Sure, it doesn't look terribly attractive, but it glows nicely, so we're happy. This is a very low-priced item, after all. I ordered this on the 10th of last month and it arrived on the 28th, which was 9 days before the earliest projected delivery date. I feel that the seller made pretty good time, given that it was delivered from China. In my experience, jewelry coming from China takes an average of 20 days to arrive (for future reference). All in all, I am very satisfied with my purchase, and I would recommend this as a gift for anyone.

Note: my sister's head is approximately 20" in circumference, and the chain fit easily over her head with plenty of room to spare. The pendant hangs below her bust line, about the middle of her ribcage.
Okay so here's why I'm giving it four stars. It was late AND it is not as large as the pictures make it appear. Now, it IS quite lovely and does glow. So if the size isn't an issue, it's grand.

It looks like it did in the picture. It needed to be buffed clean when it arrived. It was dingy, sticky and dull on the back, not all rubbed off. The blob of glow in the dark paint is a sloppy mess inside. I don't know yet if it will glow in natural light from wearing it all day, but it does glow when put next to a light. It is pretty, They should just take more pride in presenting the item to customers. Especially when bought as a gift for someone. I was disappointed when the recipient sent pictures of what it looked like when it arrived. All in all she liked it.

reviewText: This pendant is very pretty, although it's kind of flimsy and definitely feels cheap. That isn't a problem for me, but anyone looking for a product that feels high quality wouldn't like this. The chain works well for me and the clasp isn't difficult to use. The locket opens, and while mine doesn't actually have a little bead or stone inside, the inside is painted with glow in the dark paint. When I first received I thought there was supposed to be a stone, and the back didn't glow, but after a few days I noticed that it actually does glow - I guess it just needed more light exposure than I expected. The finish on mine is silver-colored, but does not look like antiqued silver as described. The chain will probably turn your neck green after a lot of wear, but I haven't worn mine frequently enough for that to happen. Since I paid $2 for it, I didn't expect anything higher quality, and I'm totally okay with that. I like it!

reviewText:
This jacket is really great. The look has a nice modern feel to it but it also has a classic look.  The denim part of the jacket feels like a nice quality. The stitching seems strong, so this jacket should last for a long time. The jacket fits as expected.

Overall, this is a great quality jacket. Please note, I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for a review
Run true to size fit really well

The item was as expected, and looks really good. I've been looking for a casual jacket to wear to school and when going out with friends, and I think this is the one. I would recommend buy a size up then your regular size. The quality looks very nice, and the jean in it looks amazing. I received a discounted product in exchange for an honest review.
I have to give this item 5 stars and here is why:
1. Fast shipping.
2. Well made and looks great in person.
3. Good price.
If you are planning to buy this jacket, have someone measure and take notes:
1. Chest. Around whole body.
2. Arm length. From shoulder to wrist.
3. Shoulders. From should to shoulder across.
4. Waist. All the way around.

*I received this product at a discount for an honest review.
perfect... its my favorite now

I have to give this item 5 stars and here is why:
1. Fast shipping (12 days to California).
2. Well made and looks great in person.
3. Good price.
If you are planning to buy this jacket, have someone measure and take notes:
1. Chest. Around whole body.
2. Arm length. From shoulder to wrist.
3. Shoulders. From should to shoulder across.
4. Waist. All the way around.

Next, take this information and order the size that falls within these parameters. I ordered the large and it fit perfect!
The only negative point was the buttons on the front rattle, making noise. No big deal though.
summary: I Really love this jacket! You will to if you follow my directions on how to order.

reviewText:
This jacket is very comfortable! I bought it for my husband to wear since it's very casual. The hood is detachable so it offers two different looks. The sleeves are very soft  and hood( similar to that of sweatpants but softer).  It looks good buttoned or unbuttoned depending on your personal preference. The denim is a dark wash and has silver buttons. I will say that you need to probably order a size up from the guide. My husband tried it on and it was a little snug for him. Other than running small, the product is great! It's lightweight, but doesn't feel cheap!

reviewText:
I do not know my exact upper body measurements but I do know the US size I generally wear is medium. I ordered the 3X which would be the equivalent of a US large and it is a tad short length-wise and although I could get is buttoned across my chest, it was somewhat snug to the point I could feel it when I breathed. I am a medium build all the way with a slight beer gut but no muffin-top or anything. There is a pic of me below wearing this with three buttons buttoned up. Sorry but it was the best selfie I could do without a selfie stick.

Also, they have a white tshirt or lining of some kind pictures. Mine came with no such lining at all and I put a pic of that as well. No complaints but I want to be sure everyone knows what they are getting. The jacket itself is a bit thin so do not expect it to keep you warm or anything.

Overall this is a nice jacket and the removable hood is a good idea but leaving it on won't hurt,especially since you won't lose it then. Remember to up-size quite a bit when ordering. My only wish is it had more pockets but I knew that when ordering.

I received this at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

The 1 star is for the size.  After reading the reviews I ordered a XXL (I wear a Large).  It's a tight fit, 1 washing and it won't fit at all.  Otherwise it's nice and comfortable, which won't matter if you need a shoehorn to get in and out of it.  If you wear a Large, don't order it.  If you wear a Medium, order the XXL and don't wash it.  Also, beware it has no pockets for your hands, no pockets inside either.

reviewText:
Not sturdy. The system of shoving in cards between the two aluminum sheets isn't great. It is hard to retrieve a card on the spot in a store even with their design of pushing out all cards half through the wallet before choosing the card you need.

Those four rubber latches on the side that keep the two aluminum sheets together broke one by one in one month of usage with only 8 cards in the wallet (see images attached for details). Overall poor design. It looks great and it's a conversation maker, but that's about it.

Lastly, if you go against my advice and buy one, DON'T buy the black wallet. The black surface scratches very easily inside your pockets. God forbid you have the keys and the wallet in the same pocket. I've never seen anything scratching so easily in my life. Then you have this beat off wallet that looks like you've been using for years when in reality has been around for only 2-3 weeks.
summary: Definitely not worth the price; Will break very easily. Do not Buy! Horrible design. Looks beat off after only 3 weeks of using.

I'm 5 ft 2 1/2, 132 pounds with a 34 C bust. I saw all the ratings and they seemed a bit mixed as far as people past 120 pounds, so I thought I'd give the outfit a try.

The crop top fits comfortably and makes my boobs look nice and full, but I'd say it's a really short crop top. Then again, I'm not really a crop too kinda girl, so I'm not exactly an expert in this department. Either way, I'm still pleased with how it looks and feels c:

Now the skirt is another story~  I'll admit I have a chubby tummy and some big hips, but this skirt is so small on me, it won't fit unless I pull it up to my belly button... and even then because of the velcro, it literally pops off of me lol :9 Despite that hilarity, it's still really cute, decently made and should work for my purposes (wedding anniversary ;D) and won't be much of a deal breaker. Just be warned though, if you are a thick girl, you'll be in the same place I am...

The socks fit fine, though a little tight on my thick thighs. That's okay though, at least they won't fall down easily lol

So all in all: Cute outfit. Decently made. Is it designer quality? Pffft nah! If you're expecting a true quality school girl outfit, go buy a $100 cosplay outfit on Ebay or something. :P It's definitely NOT one size fits most. More like one size fits petite girls under 120 pounds ;P (used to be a size 0, would know XP). I would suggest trying to find something perhaps in a couples boutique for something that fits.

reviewText:
This is a shirt I bought simply because my hubby liked it.  I don't have any problems with the color, I love purple and it goes well with my complexion.  Ruffles aren't necessarily my favorite, but these are done well enough to where I don't mind wearing them.

My trouble with this shirt is that it makes me look pregnant.  Ok, so I'm short, and there's not a lot of space between my bust and my backside, so while I have a flat enough tummy and even some decent enough ab definition, you totally can't tell in this shirt. It pooches out because of the flouncing in just the right spot. It's something I'm not particularly fond of.  Now I don't necessarily like to wear very fitted shirts either, so it' not the looseness that bothers me, it's the fact that I think it makes me look puffy in the middle.  Now I did ask a member of my son's therapy team, and she totally thinks it's in my head.  But then, if you feel like something makes you look bloated it doesn't necessarily matter as much how other people see it, because part of you is still uncomfortable anyways.

So this is something that could work for you or against you.  If you actually are pregnant, and aren't wanting anyone to know yet...great shirt for that, totally great.  If you aren't pregnant and don't want to look it...well, that one could be in the eye of the beholder.  Otherwise, there's nothing technically wrong with this shirt that I can see, and everybody assures me it's pretty on me.  I'm surrounded by great people, that's just all I'm going to say about that ;)
summary: Decent Shirt, Puffy Looking in the Midsection

It does not reach loosely to the hips the way it does on the model. Plan on wearing a a tank or something underneath to keep the midriff covered. Having said that, this blouse is very pretty with the ruffled neckline and the pleated sleeves. One bonus is that the  expected date of arrival was about 6 weeks after I ordered it, and it actually came in less than half that time.

C2U Women Pullover Elegant Wave Flouncing Long Sleeve Chiffon Shirt This is such a pretty blouse. It is so feminine. Its so comfortable to wear. This is something I see myself wearing a lot. Sizing: When I ordered this blouse, I ordered a size larger based on old reviews. I wish I had read the listing better, because the seller went back to the manufacture and had them fix the size issue. So when I received this item it is a little bit big on me. I plan on making it work just the same. Style: This blouse is high on style. It has several notable design elements to it. First, this a pull over blouse. There is no zippers or closures. It has a round neckline accented with a double ruffle made from pleated chiffon. The neckline is further embellished with two fabric flowers and a cascade ruffle. The front of the blouse has large pleats coming down the front and a banded waist band. The sleeves are long and made from the pleated chiffon. Each sleeve is accented with a cuff at the wrist. Fabric: The fabric this blouse is made of is absolutely gorgeous. The chiffon and pleated chiffon are made of polyester. The lining and back of the blouse are made of a cotton knit. Fabric care for this blouse is hand wash in a woolite like product and lay flat to dry. Alternatively, professionally cleaned at a dry cleaner would work as well. This blouse is well constructed. The best way to tell if a top is well made is to turn it wrong side out and look at the seams. The seams on this blouse have all been surged to keep the chiffon from freying. All the seems are straight. No loose threads could be found. This blouse is perfect for almost any occasion. I intend to use it as a work blouse. Because of its modest styling, you could wear it to church, dinner out, special events or a party. Depending on how you pare this blouse, you can wear it dressy or casual. I have a grey skirt that I have been dying to wear. This blouse will look great with it. Also, it will look awesome with a pair of white or black dress pants. This is such a beautiful blouse. I can't wait to start wearing it. Sample received for a fair and honest evaluation. I found that this item matched the description accurately on the listing page. This review is my honest opinion based on my personal experience using this product. C2U Women Pullover Elegant Wave Flouncing Long Sleeve Chiffon Shirt,Purple XL

I love it. The color, the pattern, everything. The top is a spandex-y top with chiffon sleeves and a loose chiffon layer over the front. This top layer is great at hiding some of the flaws that a larger person like myself has. I wear a 16W from Target and Kohl's. Based on their size chart, I knew that this would run on the slightly smaller side than I'm used to, but decided to try it anyway. If it wasn't for the loose chiffon layer, I probably wouldn't like it as much. I wore this and felt incredible. I did receive a lot of positive feedback, but I'd wear it again even if no one else liked it because *I* like it that much. Whenever I see that rich purple color, it makes me happy. I'm so glad I took the chance and bought it, despite the sizing chart being 1/2-1" smaller than I normally go for. (I bought the largest size available).

As you can see, I paired it with a black cardigan, and also black pants. The photo has a more yellow tint to it than IRL. The color matched exactly what I thought it would based on the photo - but do take into account your own monitor and how it has matched color expectations in the past. The top is absolutely work appropriate and only the sleeves are see-through. I'm 5/7 and it hit me around my hips. Definitely a great find IMO.
summary: LOVE the color, and the chiffon front layer.

I ordered one size up based on other reviews. I am not a small person and would normally have ordered an XL, therefore I ordered the XXL. (For those of you that like to be modest or try to always go with the smallest of your size.. I would say, order 2 sizes up, because I too can fit into a Large .)
The next thing I think is important to share is to not judge it's size based on looks alone.. When I first took the product out of the package, it was very deceiving; At first glance I almost shipped it back because it looked tiny. (I had read a review that expressed the blouse must come in doll sizes, and at that moment I knew what they were speaking.) However, something told me to still 'try' to try it on. And I am so glad I did! This has easily become one of my favorite fancy/elegant blouses to wear. I am so fond of it that I have now ordered the other color it is available in. Such a great price for such a lovely piece. I am very pleased!

summary: They are comfortable and easy to wear all day

reviewText: I wasn't expecting much out of these $10 boots. I mean come on how good can they be at this price? Well they are no designer boots but they are definitely cute and fit just fine. About the same quality you would get from Target but at an extremely reasonable price. I could get 3 pairs of these for the price of 1 from Target. So kind of a no brainer here.  I would give 5 stars but there are just a couple little things that bug me slightly. The shape over the top of the foot is a little odd, shaped more like a slipper boot but not too obvious unless they are in your face. However that does give more room for a thicker sock with out cutting off your circulation. They do have nice toe room. I am borderline needing wide width, depending on the brand but most medium width fit fine. They could use a little more cushion in the sole but they are not uncomfortable at all. Would be fine for going out or shopping. Can't say I would wear them if I had to stand and walk all day just because there is very little shock absorption or cushion. Overall I'm impressed. Usually u get what you pay for but for $10 a pop, these boots can not be beat. I'm ordering a few more colors and checking out some other styles. I can now afford to have a different pair of boots for everyday of the week! Thanks!

This gray is a nice color for these combat boots.  I have had real leather combat boots in the past which were too heavy and clunky.  These are neither.
The color is more of a taupe but still qualifies as gray.  Because these are PU leather there are very light.  I wish they had some kind of arch support.  I did have to put on an extra toe cover because they hurt my big toe - but the extra cushioning there did help.  They were warm.  I am going to see if an arch support will fit in the bottom and hopefully not make the fit too small.  For the price all in all I would say a good buy.
summary: This gray is a nice color for these combat boots

This necklace is quite pretty.  I received it fast and none of the gems were loose.  I did remove the green beaded part, as I didn't like the fact that it didn't match the pretty pastel green gems.  I thought it looked out of place.  It was easy to remove and I'm much happier with just the gold chain accenting the necklace.  The gems were glued a bit off center but not really noticeable and no problem considering it was such a good price.  The necklace is metal, not plastic so it has some weight to it which is nice.  If you were to buy this piece at a specialty store it would cost at least close to 40 dollars at minimum.  I am very pleased.

I feel I need to revise this review.  Since the above review, I have ordered three more necklaces as gifts, all in the white and cream color.  One shipment of two, then again I ordered a third.  Each necklace came slightly broken.  However I was able to fix each necklace with either pliers or a hot glue gun.  I think the packaging and shipment is to blame.  The necklace is bounced around all the way from China.  Clearly I didn't find this minor fixes an issue since I kept ordering them.  If you are prepared to fix the minor issues it's still a great necklace.
summary: This necklace is quite pretty. I received it fast and none of the ...

It is amazing in the hand painted detail! When my clasp broke they backed up their product and replaced iit! I must mention that iis quality made. I just received one that happened to have aflaw.

It really is as pretty as their pictures. But mine came with one more bead than they show. It's a smaller gauge than the others, and I'm sure they intend it as a FEATURE: a stopper that prevents the beads from falling off when you open the clasp, But that means you cannot customize the bracelet, which was my intent when I bought it. I intended to remove many of the silver beads.

I've tried to pull off this extra bead, to unscrew it over the end of the bracelet, and to unscrew the end of the bracelet itself, all no luck. The chain itself looks very nice and sturdy, so I'd hate to destroy it just so I can liberate the beads. But the bracelet is heavy (44 g or 1.55 oz) and more ornate than I want. <sigh>

Arrow in photo points to the extra bead.
---------
Updated: FINALLY got the stopper bead OFF! I wiggled/screwed it ONTO the end piece of the bracelet, and then watched from where the end piece is attached to the bracelet, to align the bead hole with the back edge of the end piece.

Also wanted to share that 3 of the beads are shiny/plain on half their surface. See photo with 2 views of those beads.
summary: Extra stopper bead is wonderful & horrible.

This is one of those that's hard to rate. It just depends on how pregnant you are, and how you grow during pregnancy. I ordered this while I was 20 weeks pregnant in a medium (I'm about 5' 2" and pre pregnancy weight about 125) I hadn't gained much weight but figured a medium would be best since other medium maternity clothes fit my chest. For this particular shirt it was quite a bit bigger than I would have expected, and my biggest complaint is the elastic on the sides.
It bunches up much more than any other maternity shirt I have, so much so that it shows skin if I wiggle too much.
Besides that it's an adorable shirt, I was just dissapointed with the sides more than anything, especially considering how short I am.

reviewText: This bag was exactly what I expected. I like that you can add the chain or use the strap. The length of the strap is adjustable. This is a medium/small bag, perfect to throw over your shoulder. In it I can carry everything I need (phone/wallet, keys, pens, makeup/sanitary items, medicine) plus a medium sized book and a bottle of water, but beyond that this is not a huge purse and will not hold school books or anything like that. It has two flaps pictured on the front, each opening up to a slot with the front being smaller and flatter and the back being the bulk of the storage space. This may seem obvious but the circle (sequins?) hanging off the front of the bag do make noise, and it is noticeable. I figured that may be the case before I bought the bag, and the sound isn't unpleasant. Everyone says it sounds like a bellydancer, if that makes sense. I bring that up because at times I wish I could make it be quiet. For instance, this may not be a purse you'd bring to a library as I'm sure you'd draw attention with the sound, and you may not want to bring this bag to class if you tend to be late. The skulls are very cute though and I am satisfied with the quality. The material is very soft. I'm glad I bought this bag and it gives off a bit of a gypsy/punk vibe.
summary: I like that you can add the chain or use the ...

reviewText:
Super cute!  I read the reviews and ordered the XS/S for my regular size 8.  The dress is adorable and looks cute BUT the backside of the dress is super thin material; it is the material you would find on a costume.  The fabric kept riding up - I really needed double sided tape but was out of town for a party and didn't have it with me - bad planning on my part. Again, it is super thin so you need to wear something underneath.  And then when you wear something (a slip, spanx, etc) it is slippery and it rides up. I wore it to an office party and had to make sure I wasn't being in appropriate.

Overall, super cute but make sure you plan ahead!  As it is, I don't really think you can wear it without something underneath,.
summary: super cute, lots of compliments! But...plan ahead!

If it these affordable clipless pedals or doing without, get them. Despite their faults, much better to have these rather than toe strap clips or plain beartrap pedals. The ability to add power on the upstroke is nice, but the key benefit list your bike over obstacles or in weight the bike. Downside on these particular pedals are gritty bearings. For that reason I recommend investigating other brands. The shoes are about 1/2 size large. Thanks to other reviewers I ordered size 10 instead of 10 1/2. Perfect fit. Very light shoes. Comfortable. It will be interesting to see if they hold up over time.

Update: The pedal bearings have gotten smoother with use. I really like the light weight shoes. Astonishing how heavy other "better" shoes are in comparison.
summary: Affordable clipless prdals and light shoes.

reviewText: Great products at a great price. Thank you.  Beginner to this sport.

For the money you can not beat these.  The pedals are a bit heavy, and the shoes are not the most stylish, but they work.  This was my first clipless setup and I was looking to get into it with minimal spend.  I have put about 350 miles on the bike with them and am glad I did.  Eventually I will probably swap them out for something nicer, but they are holding up well so far.

reviewText: Good shoes for the price.

Seems a lot of the lower rating reviews have to do with improper size or user error (improper use and setup) which should not affect the product rating itself.

I worked in the industry for about a decade from mid 80's to mid 90's. Fitting up riders and setting up clipless pedals is something I have done countless times.  I have fitted and recommended shoes to just about every kind of rider out there.  What I can tell you is these are a great deal for the price and the shoe itself is comparable to Shimano shoes around the $100+/- price point (entry to low intermediate).  The pedals can be rebuilt and after disassembly and examination, they are comparable to SPDs in the $40 - $50 range.  (Both price points above are online from major outlets, not from a brick and mortar shop which would be slightly higher).

I took these out on a couple of trail parks in my area and they performed as expected.  They are more than reasonably comfortable, but you do need to order 1/2 to 1 size smaller.  I am just short of a US 11 and the 44.5 fits great with no socks or typical foot socks. (see pics)  I live in florida, so thicker socks are never used.

Here is the rundown:

Application:  This is a race type MTB shoe.  However, the soles are not quite as stiff as my Shimano shoes had.  Considering I am no longer racing, but riding for pleasure, this is fine and actually makes the shoes a little easier to walk in, not much, but a little.  This is handy since I do a lot of riding at MTB parks where there are stop/rest areas and picnic tables near technical parts and places to get off and rest.  If you are looking for a hard core race shoe, this might not be the shoe for you. Then again, you wouldn't be looking at anything under $225 if you are.

Weight/Construction:  The weight of the shoe is a little less or the same as some of my other shoes.  This is likely due to having less tread on the bottom.  This might effect the longevity of the shoe sole with excessive walking, but primarily in the heel area.  The synthetic materials are sturdy and well stitched.  The breathable mesh is comparable to other shoes, but I would say the synthetic leather and strap backings are a slightly thinner gauge.  Not enough that I would be too concerned unless you fall a lot or hit a bunch of stuff with your feet on the trails... But then again, any shoe is going to suffer to some degree.

Pedals: I installed them on a second bike and I have my vintage Shimano SPD-M737s on my primary bike.  Stock, mine were adjusted Med - Med/light tension and very close to where I have my 737s set. They have a slightly smaller platform which I am not use to, but as far as the actual binding actuators go, they perform like the 737s.

Cleats:  Again, as expected.  If you do a lot of walking or have to get off on rocky sections, chances are you will give them some abuse.  I have broken Shimano cleats in the past and I always carry an extra set.

A word to the wise:  If these are your first clipless pedals, and you are handy with an allen wrench and have some basic mechanical skills, you can likely set these up yourself. If not, go to a shop and let them install and fit you up.  If you DIY, just make sure you take your tools with you on your first couple of rides. Getting them adjusted at home may reveal some need for adjustments once you actually hit the trail.  Just make sure you ride trails with a variety of technical terrain that you regularly ride.

There are no directions, but you can youtube or google MTB SPD pedal setup and find loads of info.  Regardless of the brand, the setup is roughly the same. Just make sure if you adjust the tension on your pedals, adjust equally for both pedal sides. Count your turns and go in small increments.

Happy riding and stay safe on the trails!
summary: Very good value for entry level race type SPD clipless setup

reviewText: This necklace looks very pretty with denim and my sundresses. I received compliments on it.

Arrived about two weeks earlier than estimated - that's always a plus.  For the price, I can't complain.  I love that the earrings are very light on my ears, not heavy to the point they'd stretch my lobes.  The overall set looks nice on, nicely complimented my other accessories and nicely completed my outfit.  I would purchase from the company again.  If I spend a lot of money on Jewelry, than I'm purchasing real and not plated or costume jewelry.  In addition, I do have allergies to nickel - so I don't spend much on faux jewelry, that I may not be able to wear or wear for a long period of time.  Also I cleaned the jewelry with alcohol and a UV lamp, after opening and have worn for at least 5hrs.  So far no irritations - which in my case is a good sign.  It doesn't take long for my skin to react.  I gave them a 5 star because for inexpensive jewelry, it was what I expected and had a nice shine - not too bright and not dingy or old looking.
summary: I love that the earrings are very light on my ears

There is a very good reason they do not show an actual person wearing this necklace...  If they did, you would be able to see exactly how SMALL it is.  It is 4 inches across, however, the photo makes it look like it is twice this size.  The 'mannequin' that it is displayed on in the picture is not the size of an actual person, it is doll sized.  When an actual person is wearing it, it does not cover the chest as shown, but only sits under the neck.

If an adult were to wear it, it would not look right since it's obviously low quality. Little girls will love the jewels though. One thing to understand- these jewels are not hanging from a chain. They are sewn to a thick black felt backing which is sewn to two black ribbons that tie around the neck. Again, fine for child's play, but would not look ok on a person trying to look dressed up or classy. My daughter loves it and I got my money's worth so I'm happy.

reviewText: A bargain. Very attractive.
stay in love.!!!

I bought 7 necklaces from this seller. How can you not when they are so cheap?  While it did make nervous that the pieces were so cheap, I figured that unless they arrived completely destroyed, I would be able to fix any of them up or add a new chain if need be.  All pieces arrived intact. I tweaked a few rough edges and closed a few jump rings, but nothing crazy. This piece lays very well. I was nervous that the pieces would bunch up or lie over one another, but thankfully that is not the case. This is definitely a piece I will get a lot of use out of. Not sure if I will wear the earrings, but the necklace is awesome.  I am going to order more items from this seller.

Cons :
